languages.text: Изъятие десятины невозможно без ее описи. Этот документ хранится у клерка Терция Кварта, который находится где-то в окрестностях аванпоста.
The tithe cannot be extracted without a detailed inventory. This document is held by the clerk Tertius Quart, who should be somewhere in the near vicinity of the outpost.
languages.original_text: Изъятие десятины невозможно без ее описи. Этот документ хранится у клерка Терция Кварта, который находится где-то в окрестностях аванпоста.

traits.locale_text: The tithe cannot be extracted without a detailed inventory. This document is held by the clerk Tertius Quart, who should be somewhere in the near vicinity of the outpost.

The tithe cannot be extracted without a detailed inventory. This document is held by the clerk Tertius Quart, who should be somewhere in the near vicinity of the outpost.

languages.text: No se puede extraer el diezmo sin un inventario exhaustivo. Este documento está en posesión del funcionario Tertius Quart, que debería encontrarse en las cercanías del puesto.
languages.original_text: The tithe cannot be extracted without a detailed inventory. This document is held by the clerk Tertius Quart, who should be somewhere in the near vicinity of the outpost.

traits.locale_text: No se puede extraer el diezmo sin un inventario exhaustivo. Este documento está en posesión del funcionario Tertius Quart, que debería encontrarse en las cercanías del puesto.

languages.text: 如果得不到详细资源清单，就无法领取什一税。这份清单在一个叫做特蒂乌斯·夸特的职员手中，他应该就在哨站附近的某个地方。
languages.original_text: The tithe cannot be extracted without a detailed inventory. This document is held by the clerk Tertius Quart, who should be somewhere in the near vicinity of the outpost.

traits.locale_text: 如果得不到详细资源清单，就无法领取什一税。这份清单在一个叫做特蒂乌斯·夸特的职员手中，他应该就在哨站附近的某个地方。

languages.text: 租税は、詳細なインベントリなくして抽出できない。この文書は、前哨基地の近くのどこかにいるはずの事務員ターティウス・クアートが持っている。
languages.original_text: The tithe cannot be extracted without a detailed inventory. This document is held by the clerk Tertius Quart, who should be somewhere in the near vicinity of the outpost.

traits.locale_text: 租税は、詳細なインベントリなくして抽出できない。この文書は、前哨基地の近くのどこかにいるはずの事務員ターティウス・クアートが持っている。

languages.text: Ohne detailliertes Inventar kann der Zehnt nicht ausgeflogen werden. Das Dokument ist im Besitz eines Beamten namens Tertius Quart, der sich in der Nähe des Außenpostens aufhalten sollte.
languages.original_text: The tithe cannot be extracted without a detailed inventory. This document is held by the clerk Tertius Quart, who should be somewhere in the near vicinity of the outpost.

traits.locale_text: Ohne detailliertes Inventar kann der Zehnt nicht ausgeflogen werden. Das Dokument ist im Besitz eines Beamten namens Tertius Quart, der sich in der Nähe des Außenpostens aufhalten sollte.

languages.text: La dîme ne peut pas être évacuée sans un inventaire détaillé. Le greffier Tertius Quart, qui doit se trouver quelque part à proximité de l'avant-poste, détient ce document.
languages.original_text: The tithe cannot be extracted without a detailed inventory. This document is held by the clerk Tertius Quart, who should be somewhere in the near vicinity of the outpost.

traits.locale_text: La dîme ne peut pas être évacuée sans un inventaire détaillé. Le greffier Tertius Quart, qui doit se trouver quelque part à proximité de l'avant-poste, détient ce document.

languages.text: Aşar, detaylı envanter olmadan aktarılamaz. İlgili belge, karakol civarında bir yer olması gereken kâtip Tertius Quart'ın elinde.
languages.original_text: The tithe cannot be extracted without a detailed inventory. This document is held by the clerk Tertius Quart, who should be somewhere in the near vicinity of the outpost.

traits.locale_text: Aşar, detaylı envanter olmadan aktarılamaz. İlgili belge, karakol civarında bir yer olması gereken kâtip Tertius Quart'ın elinde.
